column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Got a classic deep dish pizza
column2: and BBQ chicken salad. Don't trust that you are hungry and can eat a lot pizza. I saw while waiting a couple walked out with a leftover box
column3: handed it over to a young dude waiting to get in
column4: saying they ordered too much and could not finish. Ours was a medium
column6: it took a great effort to chew down just over half a pie. It was a great pizza
column7: great size and very filling. Not tomato paste
column8: it's crushed tomato and pulling yard long yummy cheese.
